# t_pre

Format/beautify array



Name  |  Type  |  Description  |  Status  |  Default
------------  |  ------------  |  ------------  |  ------------  |  ------------
$array  |  **{ [Array](http://php.net/manual/en/language.types.array.php) }**  |  The array to be print  |  required  |
